content.raw:
I noticed that you started fixing windows warnings, though there is still [one caused by new code in this PR](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/ignition/job/ignition_math-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64/72/warnings34Result/).

In [branch pairing2_scpeters](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-math/commits/branch/pairing2_scpeters), I've fixed that warning, as well as some warnings Kmeans_TEST.cc that Appveyor generates. Once all the warnings were fixed, I enabled a compiler flag for appveyor to treat warnings as errors. This should help us catch them in the future.
content.html:
I noticed that you started fixing windows warnings, though there is still one caused by new code in this PR.

In branch pairing2_scpeters, I've fixed that warning, as well as some warnings Kmeans_TEST.cc that Appveyor generates. Once all the warnings were fixed, I enabled a compiler flag for appveyor to treat warnings as errors. This should help us catch them in the future.
